title: Scott Bonn - 106
description:
Scott Bonn. Professor of Criminology, Scott Bonn, joins us on the podcast to discuss the fascination that so many seem to have with serial killers. Why would someone want to collect items from people who have committed such atrocities? How have murderers like Ted Bundy and Jeffrey Dahmer become so popular in the media? Dr. […]
The post Scott Bonn – 106 – Generation Why appeared first on The Generation Why Podcast.
